general.name: specLite_epoch
general.short: spectral data for a given field, epoch, and catalogid
general.description: The spectral data for a given field, epoch, and catalogid including the coadded spectra, spAll metadata, Model fit metadata from spZall, and Line fitting metadadta from spZline

surveys.name: BHM
surveys.description: An optical time-domain spectroscopic survey of quasars and X-ray sources

releases.name: WORK
releases.description: SDSS unreleased data.  Represents any work-in-progress data.

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another

FIELD.name: FIELD
FIELD.description: SDSS FieldID (plateID for plate era data)

MJD.name: MJD
MJD.description: Modified Julian date of combined Spectra

MJD_FINAL.name: MJD_FINAL
MJD_FINAL.description: Mean MJD of the Coadded Spectra

MJD_LIST.name: MJD_LIST
MJD_LIST.description: List of MJD of each included exposures

TAI_LIST.name: TAI_LIST
TAI_LIST.description: List Tai for each exposure (at midpoint)

EXPTIME.name: EXPTIME
EXPTIME.description: Total Exposure time of Coadded Spectra

TARGET_INDEX.name: TARGET_INDEX
TARGET_INDEX.description: Index of target on combined spField

FIBERID_LIST.name: FIBERID_LIST
FIBERID_LIST.description: List of FiberIDs contributing to Stack

PROGRAMNAME.name: PROGRAMNAME
PROGRAMNAME.description: Program name within a given survey

SURVEY.name: SURVEY
SURVEY.description: Survey that field is part of

CARTON_TO_TARGET_PK.name: CARTON_TO_TARGET_PK
CARTON_TO_TARGET_PK.description: SDSS-V CartonToTarget DB Table Primary Key

OBJTYPE.name: OBJTYPE
OBJTYPE.description: Why this object was targetted. QSO=SCIENCE

SPECOBJID.name: SPECOBJID
SPECOBJID.description: Unique ID based on Field, MJD, FIBERID, RUN2D

CALIBFLUX.name: CALIBFLUX
CALIBFLUX.description: Broad-band flux in SDSS-{ugriz} from PSFmag

CALIBFLUX_IVAR.name: CALIBFLUX_IVAR
CALIBFLUX_IVAR.description: Inverse var flux SDSS-{ugriz} from PSFmag

OPTICAL_PROV.name: OPTICAL_PROV
OPTICAL_PROV.description: The source of the optical CATDB_MAG magnitudes

MAG.name: MAG
MAG.description: [u, g, r, i, z] optical magnitudes

PSFMAG.name: PSFMAG
PSFMAG.description: [u, g, r, i, z] optical PSF magnitudes

FIBER2MAG.name: FIBER2MAG
FIBER2MAG.description: [u, g, r, i, z] optical Fiber2 magnitudes

CATDB_MAG.name: CATDB_MAG
CATDB_MAG.description: [u, g, r, i, z] Raw TargetDB magnitudes

GRI_GAIA_TRANSFORM.name: GRI_GAIA_TRANSFORM
GRI_GAIA_TRANSFORM.description: provenance of photometry in SDSS-V plate design

WISE_MAG.name: WISE_MAG
WISE_MAG.description: WISE [W1, W2, W3, W4] band magnitudes

FIBER_RA.name: FIBER_RA
FIBER_RA.description: Fiber RA [J2000 for plate; at exp for FPS]

FIBER_DEC.name: FIBER_DEC
FIBER_DEC.description: Fiber DEC [J2000 for plate; at exp for FPS]

RACAT.name: RACAT
RACAT.description: Catalog RA in ICRS coordinates at coord_epoch

DECCAT.name: DECCAT
DECCAT.description: Catalog DEC in ICRS coordinates at coord_epoch

COORD_EPOCH.name: COORD_EPOCH
COORD_EPOCH.description: Epoch of the RACAT/DECCAT Catalog coordinates.

PMRA.name: PMRA
PMRA.description: Proper motion in RA (pmra is a true angle)

RA_LIST.name: RA_LIST
RA_LIST.description: List of measured RA per exposure

DEC_LIST.name: DEC_LIST
DEC_LIST.description: List of measured DEC per exposure

DELTA_RA_LIST.name: DELTA_RA_LIST
DELTA_RA_LIST.description: List of designed RA offsets per exposure

DELTA_DEC_LIST.name: DELTA_DEC_LIST
DELTA_DEC_LIST.description: List of designed DEC offsets per exposure

FIBER_OFFSET.name: FIBER_OFFSET
FIBER_OFFSET.description: Flag identifying the fiber was offset by design

XFOCAL.name: XFOCAL
XFOCAL.description: Hole/robot x-axis position in focal plane

YFOCAL.name: YFOCAL
YFOCAL.description: Hole/robot y-axis position in focal plane

LAMBDA_EFF.name: LAMBDA_EFF
LAMBDA_EFF.description: Wavelength to optimize hole location for

BLUEFIBER.name: BLUEFIBER
BLUEFIBER.description: 1 if assigned target a blue fiber; 0 otherwise

HEALPIX_PATH.name: HEALPIX_PATH
HEALPIX_PATH.description: Path to spec fits file in SAS healpix structure
